body.name: HOTWAV R6 Ultra Rugged Tablet Android 13, 15600mAh 10.4 Inch 2K FHD+, 16(8+8Virtual) GB+256GB/(2TB TF) Waterproof Tablet PC, 16MP+16MP Octa-Core IP68&IP69K/Dual SIM 4G LTE/5G WiFi/Face ID/GPS/OTG
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 27 mins
features: 【IP68/IP69K Waterproof Shockproof】HOTWAV R6 Ultra Rugged Tablet has IP68&IP69K certification, waterproof and dustproof. Conforms to the US military standard MIL-STD-810H, can withstand a 1.5-meter drop, and is particularly drop-resistant. It can also withstand harsh environments such as high temperature and low temperature. It is an ideal equipment for explorers, extreme sportsmen and outdoor workers.

【15600mAh + 20W Fast Charging + OTG】HOTWAV R6 Ultra rugged tablet is equipped with a 15600mAh battery, allowing you to use the phone for a long time without worrying about running out of power. With 20W fast charging function, it only takes 30 minutes to fully charge half, reducing waiting time.It also supports OTG function.

【16GB RAM + 2568GB ROM + 2TB TF】 HOTWAV R6 Ultra rugged and waterproof tablet adopts RAM expansion technology, fixed 8GB memory and can obtain additional 8GB virtual memory through setting.Multitasking is very smooth.It also has 256GB ROM and supports 2TB TF card, so you can download games, music or videos as much as you want.

【10.4" 2K FHD Screen + 16MP Camera】HOTWAV R6 Ultra rugged android 13 tablet features a 10.4" FHD+ large screen with a resolution of 2000x1200 pixels.Whether you are working or watching,the wide field of vision and bright colors will make you immerse in it,protecting your eyes at the same time.The 16MP HD front camera and rear camera make the picture clearer and brighter. You can capture the beauty of life anytime and anywhere.

【Octa-Core Processor + Android 13.0 + Dual Cards】 HOTWAV R6 Ultra Rugged Tablet is equipped with a Metdia Tek P60 Octa-Core processor and a fully upgraded Android 13, which has faster and more efficient performance and can run smoothly even during multitasking.It also supports dual Nano SIM Cards or 1 Nano SIM Card + 1 SD Card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An extremely durable Tablet with very long battery life!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this table for use for a the Baja 24 hour race. I chose it primarily because of it's extremely long battery life and almost milspec construction. We race in open jeeps and dust and even rain can be a problem for all of our equipment. I don't think there is another similar tablet in this price range.In addition the GSM LTE and the G5 capabilities will allow the use of navigation software and other communication products beyond the capabilities of simpler units. This tablet costs just hundreds of dollars, rather than the thousands we normally spend on race ready electronics.I have tested the tablet on a number of cross country flights using aviation software, including Garmin Pilot and it performed flawlessly. (see photos)The only downside of this tablet is weight and bulk, so it is not for everyone. You can't have your cake and eat it too. A huge battery along with ruggedized construction equals extra weight and bulk.If you need a tablet for home or office use you can purchase a lighter, cheaper tablet without G5 connectivity, but if your mission is hunting, hiking, offroad travel, motorcycling or camping, this is an ideal product at a very affordable price.I recommend this product with no reservations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable tablet with amazing battery!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a reliable choice for those in demanding professions or environments where a durable device is essential. While it has a few shortcomings, its performance, battery life, and rugged design make it a worthy investment. The battery is amazing! I used the tablet for a week on average 1-2 hour a day, it still has 70% battery, much better than my iPhone. It is little heavier compare to regular ones, but we do not have to worry about dropping them on the floor.

reviews.reviewText: i dont like the android 13 at all. there is no back button at all and us old timers are use to the back button.Only had it a day so still trying to figure it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very basic tablet massive battery
reviews.reviewText: Pretty basic speeds and power but the battery is massive and lasts all week on one charge and it’s water proof. Not a high end tablet but I’m still glad I got it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Microphone is weak
reviews.reviewText: Other than that it's OK. I tried to plug in an external microphone, but then the tablet thinks it's a headphones and stops the speakers. The system is not a regular Android and does not allow to adjust. Weird, my Galaxy phone works fine with this microphone. Though doesn't need it LOL.Otherwise the tablet is good. Develops your arm strength. Didn't try to smack it against a concrete floor or sink it in the ocean. Still, feels much safer in garage than a regular laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Android tablet
reviews.reviewText: Design is good. Battery life is great. The display is clear. I absolutely love the look and feel of it. It's smooth to the touch and feels quite sturdy. To my surprise, it performed incredibly well, delivering a smooth and lag-free experience, even when playing games. Great Android tablet for this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been using tablets for a long period of time and tried different ones for different purposes. No doubt, this is the one of the best tablets which is exactly according to my demand. I like to use it and always enthusiastic to work on it. It deserves more than five stars.
I actually sent this product back .It didn't work with the Radar I bought only ipads will work because Apple has the only app for the radar But other then that it was great thanks

Muy resistente, con buena potencia de procesamiento. La calidad de las cámaras no es muy buena, pero no es un equipo diseñado para eso, solo hay que considerarlo. Por obvias razones es más pesada que un equipo normal, pero es muy resistente. El wifi puede dar algunos problemas después de varios días sin reiniciar el equipo, pero nada que un reinicio rápido no solucione, y por su potencia este proceso es muy rápido

The media could not be loaded. Auf dem Gerät ist Android 12 Installiert und auch einige andere Apps. Aber es ist zum Glück nicht sinnlos mit Social-Media vermüllt. Wer möchte kann alle Apps wie gewohnt aus dem Appstore herunterladen.Die Bedienung ist wie bei allen Android Geräten intuitiv. Es läuft sehr flüssig und die Apps starten schnell.Zum Lieferumfang gehört neben einer deutschen Bedienungsanleitung auch eine Handschlaufe welche man auf der Rückseite festschrauben kann und ein USB-C Ladegerät (5V/3A bis 12V/1,67A) inkl. LadekabelDie Kameras (16MP) machen sehr gute Fotos, sowohl in der Ferne als auch in der Nähe.Kopplung mit W-Lan oder anderen Bluetoothgeräten läuft problemlos. Ebenfalls wird GPS schnell gefunden und die Navigation klappt super.Das Gerät ist relativ schwer mit 990 Gramm, was aber bei einem robusten Outdoorgerät normal ist und was ich auch gerne in Kauf nehme.Die Ladebuchse und der Schacht für SIM / SD Karten sind mit einer Kappe verschlossen wegen der Wasserdichtheit. Für Foto und Video Aufnahmen unter Wasser lässt es sich in einen Speziellen Modus versetzen in dem das Display nicht mehr reagiert und sich nur noch über den Ein- / Aus Knopf und die Lauter / Leiser Tasten bedienen lässt.Der Interne Speicher von 128 GB lässt sich wenn nötig mit einer SD Karte erweitern. Durch eine Dual-Karten Schacht lässt sich zusätzlich noch eine SIM Karte einlegen.

reviews.reviewTitle: so far dropped a few times
reviews.reviewText: and still fully functional. broke the screen saver it came with, but actual screen is unharmed. fast responsive screen. my wife loves the new responsive screen for all her Pokemon go type games. and it's compatible with almost all the previous tablets apps. some Samsung apps don't load, such as the gallery storage.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super stabiles und schnelles Outdoor Tablet
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ich habe das Tablet bestellt und gleich am nächsten Tag erhalten. In der Verpackung befindet sich ein OTG-Kabel,ein Netzstecker ist auch dabei! Es sind auch alle notwendigen Materialien zum Anbringen der Halterung dabei. Das Tablet ist bereits voll geladen wenn es gestartet wird. Die Einrichtung lief schnell und problemlos in wenigen Minuten ab. Ich habe mich mit dem WLAN verbunden und habe die Daten von meinem Google Phone direkt übertragen können via beigefügtem Kabel.Das Tablet läuft sehr schnell und ohne Verzögerungen/Laden. Es fällt allerdings zunächst auf, dass das Tablet etwas schwer ist (Wahrscheinlich wegen der großen Akkukapazität). Nachdem ich die Halterung angebracht habe ist das aber absolut kein Problem mehr. Obwohl ich kleine Hände habe, liegt das Tablet damit sehr angenehm in der Hand. Ich habe es unter Wasser zum Aufnehmen von Bildern und Videos verwendet, und das Tablet ist nicht beschädigt und funktioniert immer noch einwandfrei. Die Ladebuchse ist mit einer Abdeckung versehen, um das Eindringen von Wasser zu verhindern. Alles in allem finde ich das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis dieses Tablets gut
